description: FOR loop that drops all tables.
name: Drop tables

description: Load script that will generate dates between a start and end date.
name: Generate dates
code:
datesDateField:
LOAD
Date( Date('1/1/2016') + ( IterNo() - 1 ) ) as [Date Field]
  , Rand() as expr1
AutoGenerate 1
WHILE IterNo() <= ( num( Date('1/1/2022') ) - num(Date('1/1/2016')) )
;
